title: 求1.7.10 2mod
author: X0R000
txt_content:

求一个移动光源，一个连锁挖矿，1.7.10
谢谢~~~

replies.txt_content:

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-606019-1-1.html

连锁采矿
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-387183-1-1.html

replies.author: X0R000
